record.dc:title: 151HA3 Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton Co., Tennessee. Feature 47, Rectangular limestone slab grave in 1HA3. Square 22L12. Direction west.
record.wpa:narrative: Top of sides constructed of small pieces of slab; large slab placed across top from side to side and resting on top of sides. Large roughly square slabs standing on edge form the sides and ends. 3 such slabs to each side and one to each end. Smaller pieces filled in the crevices around the top. 3 large slabs form the bottom of the grave. A sand layer, possibly the end of a floor layer about 2.0' below Floor K extended across the top of the grave. Some of the slabs protruded through this.
record.wpa:comments: Burial Record Form for Burial 1HA53 available at the institution.
